description: Two fossils of an ancient arthropod named Keurbos susanae have been discovered in South Africa. The creature lived 444 million years ago during the Late Ordovician period. Its soft tissues, including muscles and guts, were found preserved but its shell, legs and head were missing. Researchers believe the species lived in low-oxygen conditions. The fossil site has now been buried due to quarrying, making the discovery even rarer.
title: 444-Million-Year-Old Inside-Out Fossil Without Head And Legs Found In South Africa

description: A striking new image from the James Webb Space Telescope reveals an Einstein ring in the Hydrus constellation. The phenomenon occurs when a massive foreground galaxy bends light from a hidden background galaxy, forming a near-perfect ring. This effect, predicted by Einstein’s theory of general relativity, helps astronomers study galaxies from the early universe. The European and Canadian space agencies highlighted how gravitational lensing can magnify distant objects, offering insights into dark matter and black holes. The image was part of Webb’s March picture of the month release.
title: James Webb Space Telescope Reveals a Stunning Einstein Ring in Hydrus

description: NASA astronaut Zena Cardman has been selected to command SpaceX’s Crew-11 mission to the ISS. The four-member crew will include Mike Fincke from NASA, Kimiya Yui from JAXA and Oleg Platonov from Roscosmos. Cardman’s appointment follows her removal from the Crew-9 mission after reshuffling to accommodate Boeing’s Starliner crew. This will be the first spaceflight for Cardman and Platonov. The mission is expected to launch in July and will ensure continued human presence aboard the ISS for research and operations.
title: NASA Astronaut Zena Cardman Appointed to Lead SpaceX Crew-11 Mission to ISS

description: Telugu political drama Racharikam, directed by Suresh Lankalapalli, arrives on Lionsgate Play on April 11. Set in the 1980s, the film follows Bhargavi Reddy and Shiva, caught between love and political turmoil in Rachakonda. Starring Apsara Rani and Vijay Shankar, the film delves into caste oppression, power struggles and family conflicts. With a strong IMDb rating of 9.3/10, Racharikam has been widely praised for its storytelling and performances. Watch it on Lionsgate Play with a subscription.
title: Racharikam OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: Astronomers have identified two exoplanets, TOI-1453 b and TOI-1453 c, orbiting a star 250 light-years away in Draco. The planets, a super-Earth and a sub-Neptune, were detected using NASA’s TESS satellite and the HARPS-N spectrograph. TOI-1453 b is a rocky planet orbiting close to its star, while TOI-1453 c is twice Earth’s size and may have a hydrogen-rich atmosphere. The discovery offers insights into planetary evolution, and researchers plan to study TOI-1453 c’s atmosphere with the James Webb Telescope.
title: Two New Exoplanets Found Orbiting a Star in Draco Constellation

description: An unexpected X1.1-class solar flare erupted from sunspot AR4046, triggering shortwave radio blackouts over North and South America. The flare originated from the sun’s eastern limb and was accompanied by a coronal mass ejection that is not expected to impact Earth. Space weather experts have warned that the sunspot will face Earth in the coming days, raising the possibility of more solar activity. Forecasters and radio operators are monitoring the region closely for any further disruption.
title: X-Class Solar Flare From Emerging Sunspot Causes Radio Blackouts

description: Acer Predator X32 X2 and Acer Predator X27U X1 were announced on Monday as the latest QD-OLED gaming monitors from the company. Catering to gamers, the new monitors come with integrated quantum dot and OLED display technologies which are claimed to deliver images with high colour reproduction and contrast ratios while consuming less power than other LCD-sporting competitors in the market.
title: Acer Predator QD-OLED Gaming Monitors With Up to 4K OLED Displays Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Garmin Vivoactive 6 was launched in the US on Tuesday. The smartwatch comes with a 1.2-inch AMOLED screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 3 protection and is claimed to offer a battery life of up to 11 days on a single charge. It is equipped with a smart wake alarm feature alongside health and wellness monitoring tools including Body Battery, Sleep Coach, Stress Tracking and HRV status.
title: Garmin Vivoactive 6 With Smart Wake Alarm, Up to 11 Days Battery Life Launched: Price, Features

description: Google is enabling its enterprise users to easily send end-to-end encrypted emails via Gmail. Announced on Wednesday, the Mountain View-based tech giant said that it has made progress in implementing the Secure/Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions (S/MIME) protocol in an easier way to allow users to send encrypted email to others on Gmail as well as on other email clients.
title: Google Updating Gmail to Allow Enterprise Users to Send End-to-End Encrypted Emails Across Platforms

description: HMD 130 Music and HMD 150 Music have been launched in India as the latest feature phones by Human Mobile Devices (HMD). The new feature phones come in multiple colour options and have a 2,500mAh battery. They are claimed to offer up to 50 hours of music playback on a single charge. They have UPI payment capabilities and sport 2.4-inch QVGA displays.
title: HMD 130 Music, HMD 150 Music With 2W Speaker, UPI Support Launched in India: Price, Specifications

description: The Indian Cybercrime Coordination Centre (I4C) systems have slashed spoofed calls by 97 percent, curbing cyber-crime and financial fraud, according to Dr Pemmasani Chandra Sekhar, Minister of State for Communications. The Department of Telecommunications' Digital Intelligence Platform (DIP) facilitates secure information sharing among stakeholders, effectively preventing telecom resource misuse.
title: Indian Cybercrime Coordination Centre Helps Reduce Spoofed Calls by 97 Percent, Minister Says

description: Lenovo unveiled the Legion Y700 (2025) gaming tablet in China in September 2024. The company is now expected to be working on a new high-end tablet. A tipster has suggested the expected chipset and display details of the purported device. The rumoured tablet is tipped to be gaming-focused as well. It will likely have a bigger battery and a slimmer build than the existing Legion tablet.
title: Lenovo Tipped to Launch High-End Gaming Tablet With Snapdragon 8 Elite SoC

description: Lumio, the latest consumer tech brand by Circuit House Technologies, is all set to unveil its smart TV lineup in India. The Lumio Vision smart TVs will go official next week in the country, and they will be available for purchase on Amazon. The Lumio Vision smart TVs are confirmed to run on Google TV, and they will feature a proprietary processor.
title: Lumio Vision Smart TVs to Launch in India on April 10; Amazon Availability Announced

description: Microsoft Security Copilot, an artificial intelligence (AI) cybersecurity tool, was used to discover several previously unknown vulnerabilities in open-source bootloaders. Last week, the Redmond-based tech giant revealed the list of the security flaws discovered in three commonly used bootloaders. One of the bootloaders is the default for many Linux-based systems, while the other two are typically used for embedded systems and Internet of things (IoT) devices.
title: Microsoft Uses Security Copilot to Identify 20 Flaws in Open-Source Bootloaders

description: Nintendo fully unveiled the Nintendo Switch 2 in a Direct presentation on Wednesday, finally providing a closer look at its next console. As seen in the first-look trailer in January, the Switch 2 is bigger and better, bringing upgrades to the original Switch in every department. The Nintendo Switch 2 features a 7.9-inch 1080p LCD screen that supports up to 120Hz refresh rate.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 With 7.9-Inch LCD Display, Magnetic Joy-Cons Fully Unveiled; Will Launch June 5

description: OpenAI might have trained its artificial intelligence (AI) models on copyrighted content, alleged a research paper. As per the recently published paper from the non-profit organisation AI Disclosures Project, the San Francisco-based AI firm’s recent large language models (LLMs) showed a higher recognition of copyrighted content compared to the older models.
title: OpenAI Trained AI Models on Copyrighted O'Reilly Media Books, Researchers Claim

description: Founded by Miller Whitehouse-Levine, the Solana Policy Institute is a non-partisan, non-profit Web3 advocacy group based in Washington, DC. In the coming months, it will host educational sessions for US policymakers, featuring key leaders from the Solana ecosystem to provide in-depth insights into blockchain and crypto use cases.
title: Solana Policy Institute Launched in Washington DC; Kristin Smith Named President

description: Sony Electronics has teamed up with Crypto.com to accept USDC payments in Singapore. The development aligns with the tech giant’s efforts to keep up with Web3-focussed fintech advancements, its announcement said.
title: Sony Online Store Begins Accepting USDC via Crypto.com Pay in Singapore

description: Microsoft's Quick Machine Recovery (QMR) is now in testing for Windows Insiders. The new QMR tool automatic detects and repairs Windows 11 boot failures. This feature could prevent a repeat of the catastrophic CrowdStrike incidents of 2024. QMR allows remote fixes via Windows Update and enables IT administrators to manage repairs on organisation-owned PCs, according to Microsoft.
title: Windows 11 Insiders Get Access to Quick Machine Recovery Tool That Tackles CrowdStrike-Like Incidents

description: Alibaba is planning to release Qwen 3, an upgraded version of its flagship AI model. The wave of new models out of Asia are threatening to undercut premium US offerings from the likes of OpenAI, Alphabet’s Google and Microsoft.
title: Alibaba Preparing for Flagship AI Model Release as Soon as April

description: Amazon Prime Video announced the availability of Apple TV+ as an add-on subscription in India and select other countries on Wednesday. Customers who have already purchased an Amazon Prime subscription can sign up for Apple’s video streaming service by paying Rs. 99 per month.
title: Amazon Prime Video Launches Apple TV+ as an Add-on Subscription in India and Other Countries

description: Apple on Monday released new firmware for several of its audio products. AirPods Pro 2, AirPods 4, and AirPods Max users can download the update to access new features and bug fixes. The company says when paired with an iPhone running the latest iOS 18.4 update, AirPods Max with USB Type-C can take advantage of two new audio features, lossless audio and support for low-latency audio playback.
title: Apple Releases New Firmware for AirPods Pro 2, AirPods 4 With Bug Fixes; AirPods Max Gets Lossless Audio

description: Amazon MX Player’s new fitness reality show, Battleground, features 16 contestants in a 28-day competition. They will undergo intense physical and mental challenges, competing in four teams under expert mentors. The show will be available for free, making it accessible to a wide audience. One male and one female will emerge as winners. Expect high-intensity action and inspiring transformations.
title: Battleground Reality Show OTT Release: Where to Watch it Online?

description: OpenAI image-generation tool led to a record surge in ChatGPT users owing to the  frenzy to create Ghibli-style AI art. Global app downloads and weekly active users on the ChatGPT app grew 11 percent and five percent, respectively.
title: Ghibli Effect: ChatGPT Usage Hits Record After Rollout of Viral Feature

description: Dhanush’s third directorial venture, Nilavukku Enna Mele Ennaadi Kobam (NEEK), has arrived on Amazon Prime Video in Telugu as Jabilamma Neeku Antha Kopama. The film, which premiered in theatres on February 21, explores love, heartbreak, and emotional turmoil. Starring Pavish, Anikha Surendran, and Priya Prakash Varrier, it has garnered mixed reviews but resonated with younger audiences. With music by GV Prakash Kumar, the film is now available for streaming.
title: Jabilamma Neeku Antha Kopama Now Available on Prime Video: What You Need to Know?

description: Lava Bold 5G was announced in India on Wednesday as the latest 5G smartphone from the domestic smartphone brand Lava. The new handset runs on a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and has a 6.67-inch display. The Lava Bold 5G has an IP64-rated build and sports a 64-megapixel rear camera unit. It houses a 5,000mAh battery with 33W fast charging support. The Lava Bold 5G will go on sale next week via Amazon.
title: Lava Bold 5G With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery Unveiled in India: Price, Specifications

description: macOS Sequoia 15.4 update is now available for eligible Mac computers. The latest macOS 15.4 update addresses over 120 security vulnerabilities and includes the redesigned Mail app first introduced on iOS, seven new emoji, and the Quick Start setup feature. New Apple Intelligence features are also introduced, with expanded availability in regions such as India.
title: macOS Sequoia 15.4 Update Fixes Several Vulnerabilities; Adds Redesigned Mail App, New Apple Intelligence Features

description: Meta Hypernova smart glasses are reportedly in development. A Bloomberg report suggests these new glasses will include a display for apps and allow control through hand gestures. Development of a second-generation model is also reportedly underway, aligning with Meta's long-term goal of launching advanced smart glasses that resemble the Project Orion smart glasses showcased in 2024.
title: Meta Hypernova Smart Glasses With Built-In Screen, Support for Hand Gestures in Development: Report

description: Motorola Edge 50 Pro with Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 SoC was launched in April last year in India. Now, its purported successor, Motorola Edge 60 Pro, seems to be making its way to the market as its live renders have leaked online. The leak suggests that the handset will be offered with a triple rear camera system. The Motorola Edge 60 Pro is expected to run on MediaTek's Dimensity 8350 SoC. It is likely to carry a 5,100mAh battery with support for 68W fast wired charging.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Pro Alleged Live Renders Leak Online; Suggests Triple Rear Cameras

description: A Nintendo Switch 2 focussed Direct showcase is slated for Wednesday, where Nintendo will share more details about the Switch successor. The company has now revealed that Wednesday’s Nintendo Direct livestream, which will provide a closer look at the Switch 2, will be approximately 60 minutes long.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Direct Presentation Today: How to Watch, What to Expect

description: OpenAI is planning to release an open-source artificial intelligence (AI) model. This would be the San Francisco-based AI firm’s first open-source reasoning-focused AI model, and it is expected to be released in the next few months. This will be the company’s first open-source release since the GPT-2 model, which was introduced in November 2019.
title: OpenAI Is Planning to Release an Open-Source Reasoning-Focused AI Model

description: OpenAI is said to be planning to expand its Deep Research feature to the users on the free tier of ChatGPT. The feature was introduced in February as an agentic tool that can autonomously conduct multi-step research on complex topics by looking for relevant information on the Internet. It is currently only available to the paid subscribers of ChatGPT.
title: OpenAI Said to Be Expanding Deep Research AI Agent in ChatGPT to Free Tier

description: Oppo will unveil the Find X8 Ultra on April 10 in China alongside the Find X8s and Find X8s+ models. Just days ahead of the official launch, the Chinese smartphone brand has released official images, revealing the design of the upcoming devices. The renders suggest hole punch display designs and shaped camera modules.
title: Oppo Find X8 Ultra, Find X8s Series Design Teased in Official Renders Ahead of April 10 Launch

description: Qualcomm announced the acquisition of MovianAI Artificial Intelligence (AI) Application and Research JSC (MovianAI) on Tuesday. MovianAI is the former generative AI division of VinAI Application and Research JSC (VinAI) and a part of the Vietnamese conglomerate Vingroup. With this move, the San Diego-based tech giant has acquired a 65 percent stake in the company.
title: Qualcomm Announces Aquisition of VinAI’s Generative AI Division MovianAI

description: Realme GT 7 will be unveiled in China later this month, the company has confirmed. Although the company has yet to reveal the exact launch date of the handset, it has confirmed its processor details. The phone will be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC.
title: Realme GT 7 Confirmed to Launch in April; to Get MediaTek Dimensity 9400+ SoC

description: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 series is rumoured to be in development. A listing of the successor to the Galaxy Watch 7 lineup has now been spotted on a South Korean certification website with the model numbers EB-BL330ABY and BL505ABY which hints towards its debut. Although Samsung hasn't provided any details about its purported smartwatch lineup so far, two models are speculated to be launched — the Galaxy Watch 8 and the Galaxy Watch 8 Classic.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series Reportedly Receives SafetyKorea Battery Certification

description: Samsung is reportedly preparing to equip its upcoming wearables with its "dream battery" technology, specifically all-solid-state batteries. According to a report, the company plans to implement this technology first in the second generation Galaxy Ring, followed by Galaxy Buds TWS earphones, and then Galaxy Watch models. This new battery type is expected to provide better energy density and durability, potentially leading to longer battery life in future devices.
title: Samsung Reportedly Plans to Upgrade Battery Technology on Galaxy Ring, Galaxy Watch, Galaxy Ring

description: Rumours about a multi-fold or tri-fold device from Samsung existed for a while. However, more news started to emerge after Samsung officially confirmed that it does have plans to launch a tri-fold device or foldable in the near future at its last Galaxy Unpacked event. There’s now a clear sign about which markets these devices are expected to launch in. Also leaked are some official model names which hint at their market availability.
title: Samsung Tri-Fold Phone to Reportedly See a Limited Launch; May Only Be Available in Two Countries

description: Circle has filed for an initial public offering (IPO) with the US Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC). If approved, Circle’s stocks will get listed on the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) as “CRCL”. The company stated that the move seeks to enhance transparency and accountability while engaging with the investor community.
title: USDC-Issuer Circle Plans IPO, Files Paperwork with US SEC: All Details

description: Vivo V50e will be introduced in India later this month. The company has confirmed the launch date, colour options, and key camera details of the handset. Previously, Vivo had revealed some build specifications of the upcoming smartphone. It will be available for purchase via Flipkart and the official Vivo e-store.
title: Vivo V50e India Launch Set for April 10; to Get 50-Megapixel Sony IMX882 Main Camera

description: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion was launched in India on Wednesday. The smartphone is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC paired with up to 12GB of RAM and a 5,500mAh battery with 68W wired fast charging support. It comes with an IP68 and IP69-rated dust and water-resistant build and a MIL-810H durability certification. The Edge 60 Fusion is equipped with a 50-megapixel triple rear camera unit and a 32-megapixel selfie shooter.
title: Motorola Edge 60 Fusion With MediaTek Dimensity 7400 SoC, 5,500mAh Battery Launched in India: Price, Features

description: Realme C73 and Realme C75 could launch in India soon. While the Chinese tech brand has yet to officially confirm a launch date, a new report suggests the possible launch timeline, colour options, and RAM and storage configurations. The upcoming Realme C-series phones are tipped to come in three different colours and two RAM and storage configurations. The Realme C73 5G and Realme C75 5G are said to pack up to 6GB RAM and a maximum 128GB storage.
title: Realme C73 5G, Realme C75 5G Said to Launch in India Later This Month; Colours, RAM and Storage Details Leaked

description: iQOO Z10X will launch in India alongside the base iQOO Z10 variant. The company has revealed the design and some key features of the iQOO Z9X 5G successor such as the chipset and battery details. The teaser shows the phone in a blue colourway with a dual rear camera unit. Previously, the iQOO Z10X had appeared on the BIS website suggesting an imminent India launch.
title: iQOO Z10X Confirmed to Launch in India on April 11 Alongside iQOO Z10; Design, Key Features Revealed

description: Google Pixel 9a will receive a new battery management feature which aims to prolong its life by optimising the charge cycles, the company has confirmed. As per the Mountain View-based tech giant, the Pixel software will manage the lithium-ion battery’s performance and maximum voltage of the handset to help maintain its health as the phone ages, taking advantage of Battery Health Assistance.
title: Google Pixel 9a Will Gain Battery Health Assistance Feature to Stabilise Performance and Ageing

description: Apple is gearing up to preview iOS 19 — its next iteration of the iPhone operating system (OS) — at the Worldwide Developers Conference (WWDC) 2025 in June. Ahead of its anticipated unveiling, a new report has surfaced which reveals the compatibility list of the update and Cupertino-based tech giant could drop support for iPhone XR and select other models.
title: iOS 19 Will Reportedly Not Support iPhone XR and Other Models Running A12 Bionic SoC
